articles.author: Express News Service
articles.title: Government likely to tighten cybersecurity norms after BigBasket data breach - The New Indian Express
articles.description: E-grocer BigBasket has been the most recent to suffer with the data of over two crore users said to have been breached. A hacker is believed to have put this data on sale for around Rs 30 lakh.

articles.description: With about 300 million daily users, video conferencing app Zoom saw its share price dropping on Monday in the wake of Pfizer's announcement about its coronavirus vaccine candidate.
